name: Granulomatous Lymphadenitis
chief_complaint: I have swollen lymph nodes in my neck and I feel tired all the time.
prognosis: Generally good with treatment, but depends on underlying cause. May require long-term management.
description: A chronic inflammatory condition characterized by formation of granulomas in lymph nodes. Can be caused by infections (like tuberculosis), autoimmune diseases, or be idiopathic. Requires thorough workup to determine etiology.
